mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gross, Stephanie

mdRecord.dcterms:description: E-Summit panel called Teaching and Learning. Participants include Harold J. Burbach, from University of Virginia Curry School of Education; Brooke E. Graham, University student; John A. Griffin, from Blue Ridge Capital Inc.; David N. Kunkel, from PSINET Inc.; Bethany L. Poole, University student; Bernard R. Robin, from University of Houston College of Education; and John M. Unsworth, from University of Virginia Institute for Advanced Technology in the Humanities
